overview_of_class:
Singular and DeRham cohomology. The DeRham Theorem. Intersection homology.
Poincare duality, applications, and examples.
name: Differential Geometry and Topology
title: WCAS MATH 440-3-41 Differential Geometry and Topology

Poincare duality, applications, and examples.
